mama kiyanne ada samajaya diha baluwama wisheshayen lankawata awashya me wage nithiyak.namuth hariyatama waradakaru kawda kiyana eka hoya gaththoth thamayi meken prayojanayak ganna puluwan.risanage prashnayedi mama danna widiyata eya usawiyedi papochcharanaya karala thiyena nisa me iranamata muhuna denna wuna kiyala mama hithanne…mada peradiga ratawala nithiyata thiyena bhaya nisa waradi karannan adu wela thiyenawa…mona balawathek waraddak kalath berenawa boru…ape mahinda mamata wena janadhipathi kenek liyumak ewwoth nidahas karanna kiyala samula ghathanayak karala thiyena ekek unath nidahas karayi…eeka nisa mama kiyanne me nithiya aagamakin ho wewa, jathiyakin ho wewa karala thiyena sewaya, wela thiyena aparada walata wada watinawa…risanata jiwithayen wandi gewanna wunata me nithiya nisa beragena thiyena jiwitha ganana wadi athi…sampurna shariya nithiya gana nam mama danne na…ihatha kotasa witharak gana mama kiyanne thisara | janawari 9, 2013 dina 8:07 pa.wa. ta ow thushan me kramaya hondayi nidahase hithanna bari gothrika ralakata.
